author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT REPORTS ERICK IS A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...EXPECTED TO BRING POTENTIALLY DESTRUCTIVE WINDS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODS TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY...
summary: ...HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT REPORTS ERICK IS A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...EXPECTED TO BRING POTENTIALLY DESTRUCTIVE WINDS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODS TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... As of 6:00 PM CST Wed Jun 18 the center of Erick was located near 14.9, -96.7 with movement NW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 953 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT REPORTS ERICK IS A MAJOR HURRICANE... ...EXPECTED TO BRING POTENTIALLY DESTRUCTIVE WINDS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLASH FLOODS TO PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN MEXICO LATE TONIGHT AND THURSDAY... As of 6:00 PM CST Wed Jun 18 the center of Erick was located near 14.9, -96.7 with movement NW at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 953 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 120 mph.

title: Summary for Hurricane Erick (EP5/EP052025)
